location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Thomas H. Sheridan, Acting Public Secretary at Tauris [Tabriz, Iran], to William Bruce

mods.abstract: Letter from Thomas H. Sheridan, Acting Public Secretary at Tauris [Tabriz, Iran], to William Bruce, acknowledging the receipt of two letters sent on 20 November and 4 December 1810 and informing that the payment made by Bruce to Mr. Robbio was approved by Sir Harford Jones.
